title: Nova Social Graph
description:
Nova is a decentralized social graph protocol focusing on privacy and user ownership.

**Key Principles:**
* User-controlled data vaults.
* Cryptographically verified relationships.
* Transparent moderation queues.

customTypes.name: Profile
customTypes.definition: { id: string, bio: string, avatar_url: string, followers_count: number, private_email(Moderator): string }

customTypes.name: Post
customTypes.definition: { id: string, content: string, author: Profile, reports(Moderator): number, is_shadow_banned(Moderator): boolean }
